summary: Utility module that defines a reusable class for launching and managing external command-line executables, encapsulating subprocess creation, argument validation, standard input/output handling, and automatic cleanup through the context-manager protocol.
business_intent: Provide a reliable, reusable way for the application to invoke third-party command-line tools (such as bioinformatics or data-processing utilities) while ensuring proper resource management, error handling, and consistent interfacing across the codebase.
